name: I got stabbed while walking home, now im reincarnated as an AK47
name_original: I got stabbed while walking home, now im reincarnated as an AK47
description:
I got stabbed while walking home, now im reincarnated as an AK47 is a platformer game developed by itsaMOGO. It was originally released in 2022.
I got stabbed while walking home, now im reincarnated as an AK47 is available on Web. The game is sold via itch.io.
